Hello! I'm Bryan Dugan, a UX designer & front-end developer in beautiful Rochester Hills, Michigan.

Currently seeking full-time employment.

Co-founder and developer at Spaceray Creative.

I design and build compelling Vue.js applications and Craft CMS websites that are both elegant and functional. Creator of custom tailored presentations and demonstrations through the means of storytelling, visual design, content, development, information architecture, user research and branding.

In my free time, I enjoy mountain biking, ice hockey, reading and craft beer.
